Title: Sensory Development: Integration before Calibration
Abstract: © 2020 Elsevier Inc.New findings show that corrections for sensory misalignment do not become adult-like until late childhood, whilst sensory integration develops years earlier. This calls for refinement of the theory which posits that to integrate the senses, the developing system must first be calibrated.© 2020 Elsevier Inc.New findings show that corrections for sensory misalignment do not become adult-like until late childhood, whilst sensory integration develops years earlier. This calls for refinement of the theory which posits that to integrate the senses, the developing system must first be calibrated.
